title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in an external jar. This issue is observed in Build 200201151. The problem occurs when searching for references to a certain field (field name not specified).
OB: When performing the search for references to the field, the search results are not being highlighted or selected in the external jar.
EB: When performing the search for references to the field, the search results should be highlighted or selected in the external jar.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE. Additionally, make sure that you have the source for rt.jar.
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Search and select the desired field (field name not specified) in the class.
4. Verify that the search results are not highlighted or selected in the external jar.
